name: Jack Deadly
description:
Jack Deadly is a homage to the classic Rick Dangerous games for the Syntax Bomb's 8-bit Wars competition, using the palette of the greatest 8-bit computer ever: The Amstrad CPC 464!

Guide Jack around dangerous locations and watch out for deadly enemies!

Controls:

Cursor keys:
LEFT: Move Left
Right: Move Right
Down: Duck / Crawl
Up:  Jump
Z: FIRE

How to Play:
Shoot Laser: Hold FIRE and press UP
Drop a Bomb: Hold FIRE and press DOWN
To Roll a Bomb: Hold FIRE, press LEFT or RIGHT, then DOWN
Punch (a switch or an enemy): Hold FIRE and press LEFT or RIGHT

Developed in Monkey2!
